name: Slime Farmer (itch) (ZoomDevelopment)
description:
Slime Farmer is a game created for the 1-Bit Gamejam. Best experience in FULLSCREEN.

Your goal is to keep at least one slime of each kind alive for as long as possible. Unfortunately, these curious monsters want to connect with other slimes BUT that would cause both of them to die. 

Use your MOUSE to drag slimes around to protect them. If there is no other way, you can kill all but two slimes to be able to continue your farm. To do this just press the ONE BUTTON on the right.

The more slimes you kill yourself the better your rating!

Have fun!!
